about_the_game:
Dive into a unique and laughter-filled party game where GIFs are your ultimate tool for creativity and chaos! Here's how it works:

  • Join from Internet-connected devices: Anyone can join in and play from your couch or over the Internet with just one copy of the game needed!

  • Express with GIFs: Receive a quirky prompt and pick three perfect GIFs to match—whether they're hilariously accurate, delightfully absurd, or outright bizarre.

  • Guess the Meaning: Other players try to decode your masterpiece. What were you really trying to say?

  • Vote for Glory: Everyone votes on the best interpretations, rewarding cleverness, humor, and sheer originality.

With easy access on Internet-connected devices, this game brings people together for an endless stream of meme-worthy moments. Whether you're in the mood to impress with your wit or just have fun with friends, this is your go-to game for unforgettable experiences.

name: GIF me a break!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any x64-capable processor
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Any x64-capable processor
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware-accelerated graphics may provide better performance.

short_description: Unleash your creativity in this hilarious party game! Use GIFs to express prompts, guess their meaning, and vote for the best responses. Play couch PvP from Internet-connected devices or online with friends.
